IDP population by Governate in Syria: 2016-2019

After almost a decade of civil war, Syria has the highest IDP population in the world with over 6.1 million forced to leave home. Hover over a section of the map to see its corresponding chart. Interact with a chart to see change over time. Values are based on the number of IDPs per governate.
